mapper.delete: DELETE FROM s3object WHERE state = 1 AND #{current} >= expired_timestamp
mapper.select: SELECT id, stream_id, object_size, prepared_timestamp, committed_timestamp, expired_timestamp, marked_for_deletion_timestamp, state FROM s3object WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE s3object SET marked_for_deletion_timestamp = #{time}, state = 3 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO s3object (id, prepared_timestamp, expired_timestamp) VALUES (#{id}, #{preparedTimestamp}, #{expiredTimestamp})
